column1: And in this case, not an honor to be Numero Uno. They lead the world as the company with the most deaths from the coronavirus. Eventually, they decided to take minimal precautions but by then, it was a bit late.https:/â€¦
Same as SOOOOO many other places. Sorry to hear this.
I agree, unfortunately many places do much the same. But a real shame that a government agency has taken few if any precautions for their employees
